hi.text: Hey! Need help building a lineup?

not_sure.text: Not sure what you mean. Use the */help* command for more information.

set_success.text: You have successfully created the queue.

cancel_success.text: You have successfully deleted the queue.

next_error.text: There is nothing left to call.

/set.name: /set
/set.synopsis: Sets up the queue. Both the 'items' and 'phrases' must be comma separated lists. e.g. `/set -c --items metallica, black sabbath, guns and roses --phrases metal band, rock band`

options.c: (optional) Uses a circular (rotating) queue. If you want items to be deleted when called, do not set c.

/next.name: /next
/next.synopsis: Calls the next thing in the queue.
